stories.text:
I was surprised to see that HN considers dev.to, and in some cases, Medium as platforms for spammers.[1] For me fact that HN flags this sites means that I should stay away from them. Am I right?

Which blogging platform would be a good choice for developers? GitHub pages, selfhosted solution, WordPress.com, https://hashnode.com?

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27108910
stories.title: Ask HK: good blogging platforms for developers?
Software Freedom Conservancy wins big step forward for open-source rights

stories.text:
https://www.oscarlist.com

Use advanced filters to browse lists like:

Best International Film Winners sorted by IMDB Rating

Best Motion Picture nominated films sorted by Rotten Tomatoes Rating

Best Motion Picture nominated films with most number of nominations

Best Comedy winning films sorted by IMDB Rating

Meryl Streep Best & Supporting Actress nominated films sorted by IMDB rating

Nominated films by David Fincher, Steven Spielberg and Martin Scorsesse

Or if you don't want to decide, get a random movie instead: https://www.oscarlist.com/random
stories.title: An app to list, filter and randomise all Oscar movies from the last 90 years
